verses.name: 1 Kings 3:15
verses.text: And Solomon awoke; and, behold, it was a dream. And he came to Jerusalem, and stood before the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and offered up burnt offerings, and offered peace offerings, and made a feast to all his servants.

verses.name: 1 Kings 3:16
verses.text: Then came there two women, that were harlots, unto the king, and stood before him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 3:17
verses.text: And the one woman said, O my lord, I and this woman dwell in one house; and I was delivered of a child with her in the house.
